event_type.description: The type or category of the event.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the event occurred.

user_id.description: The identifier for the user who triggered the event.

session_id.description: The identifier for the user's session.

page_name.description: The name of the page where the event occurred.

page_url.description: The URL of the page where the event occurred.

event_properties.description: Additional event-specific properties as key-value pairs.

app_name.description: The name of the app where the event occurred.

app_version.description: The version of the app where the event occurred.

user_agent.description: The user agent string, which provides additional device and browser information.

referrer.description: The source URL or referrer, if the event resulted from a referral.

event_outcome.description: The outcome or result of the event, if applicable.

items.description: Search queries entered by users within the catalog.

search_queries.description: List of search queries entered by users within the catalog.

image_load_time_ms.description: Time taken to load images in milliseconds.

metadata_load_time_ms.description: Time taken to load metadata in milliseconds.

resource_load_times_ms.description: Loading times for various page resources.

performance_metrics.description: Performance metrics related to page loading.
